original_text: For I received from the Lord what I also delivered to you, that the Lord Jesus on the night when he was betrayed took bread,
korean_text: 내가 너희에게 전한 것은 주께 받은 것이니 곧 주 예수께서 잡히시던 밤에 떡을 가지사

sentences.original_text: For I received from the Lord what I also delivered to you,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 주께 받은 것은 너희에게 전해준 그것이니,

sentences.original_text: on the night when he was betrayed
